title: RARI Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Research Ayurveda Research Institute (RARI) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BAMS, MD can grab this chance and apply for the RARI Recruitment 2026 . Here, we provided more information about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
